CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "cards"
(
    id                      INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,

    cardKingdomId           TEXT,

    faceName                TEXT,
    flavorName              TEXT,
    flavorText              TEXT,
    frameEffects            TEXT,
    frameVersion            TEXT,
    hand                    TEXT,
    hasAlternativeDeckLimit INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasContentWarning       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasFoil                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasNonFoil              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isAlternative           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isFullArt               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,

    keywords                TEXT,

content.text: Good. The relevant columns are `name`, `frameVersion`, and `convertedManaCost`. Let me query for the top 3 highest converted mana cost cards with frameVersion = '2003'.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT name, convertedManaCost FROM cards WHERE frameVersion = '2003' ORDER BY convertedManaCost DESC LIMIT 10;"
input.description: Get top 10 highest CMC cards with 2003 frame

content.text:
The results clearly show that Gleemax has a converted mana cost of 1,000,000 — by far the highest among cards with the 2003 frame version. It is not just "among the top three" but is actually #1.

Let me also verify the distinct top 3 to be thorough:

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT DISTINCT name, convertedManaCost FROM cards WHERE frameVersion = '2003' ORDER BY convertedManaCost DESC LIMIT 3;"
input.description: Get distinct top 3 highest CMC cards with 2003 frame

content.content:

Draco|16.0
Emrakul, the Aeons Torn|15.0
